text: in module fields, what is the purpose of `"sortable": false` on text fields (or any field)?

I think for repeaters, so when you have multiple fields within a group being repeated. if a field is not sortable, that can't be the field that shows for each item when in the parent module view. That's what I assume at least
gotcha… I guess it’s just something that gets thrown into every field type in the vs code language extension. That was throwing me off, but it makes sense if it is for repeaters
